verses.text: Then the \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w*, \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5029"\w*, and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*, \w prophesied|strong="H5013"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Judah|strong="H3061"\w* and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8036"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \add even\add* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* them.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6966"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2217"\w* the \w son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w Shealtiel|strong="H7598"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3443"\w* the \w son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, and \w began|strong="H8271"\w* to \w build|strong="H1124"\w* the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: and with \w them|strong="H5974"\w* \add were\add* the \w prophets|strong="H5029"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w helping|strong="H5583"\w* them.

¶ At the same \w time|strong="H2166"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* to them \w Tatnai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, and \w Shethar-boznai|strong="H8370"\w*, and their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0560"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* unto \w them|strong="H5922"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H7761"\w* you to \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and to make \w up|strong="H3635"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w wall|strong="H0846"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* we unto them after this \w manner|strong="H3660"\w*, \w What|strong="H4479"\w* \w are|strong="H0581"\w* the \w names|strong="H8036"\w* of the \w men|strong="H1400"\w* that \w make|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w building|strong="H1147"\w*?\f + \fr 5.4 \ft make: Chaldee, build\f*

But the \w eye|strong="H5870"\w* of their \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w upon|strong="H5922"\w* the \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w*, that they could \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w cause|strong="H0989"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* to \w cease|strong="H0989"\w*, \w till|strong="H5705"\w* the \w matter|strong="H2941"\w* \w came|strong="H1946"\w* to \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*: and \w then|strong="H0116"\w* they returned \w answer|strong="H8421"\w* by \w letter|strong="H5407"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \add matter\add*.

¶ The \w copy|strong="H6573"\w* of the \w letter|strong="H0104"\w* that \w Tatnai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, and \w Shethar-boznai|strong="H8370"\w*, and his \w companions|strong="H3675"\w* the \w Apharsachites|strong="H0671"\w*, which \add were\add* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*:

They \w sent|strong="H7972"\w* a \w letter|strong="H6600"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* him, \w wherein|strong="H1459"\w* was \w written|strong="H3790"\w* \w thus|strong="H1836"\w*; Unto \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w peace|strong="H8001"\w*.\f + \fr 5.7 \ft wherein: Chaldee, in the midst whereof\f*

Be it \w known|strong="H1934"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, that we \w went|strong="H0236"\w* into the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of \w Judea|strong="H3061"\w*, to the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of the \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, which is \w builded|strong="H1124"\w* with \w great|strong="H1560"\w* \w stones|strong="H0069"\w*, and \w timber|strong="H0636"\w* is \w laid|strong="H7761"\w* in the \w walls|strong="H3797"\w*, and \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w work|strong="H5673"\w* \w goeth|strong="H5648"\w* \w fast|strong="H0629"\w* on, and \w prospereth|strong="H6744"\w* in their \w hands|strong="H3028"\w*.\f + \fr 5.8 \ft great…: Chaldee, stones of rolling\f*

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* we \w those|strong="H0479"\w* \w elders|strong="H7868"\w*, \add and\add* \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto them \w thus|strong="H3660"\w*, \w Who|strong="H4479"\w* \w commanded|strong="H7761"\w* you to \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and to make \w up|strong="H3635"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w walls|strong="H0846"\w*?

We \w asked|strong="H7593"\w* their \w names|strong="H8036"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w*, to \w certify|strong="H3046"\w* thee, that we might \w write|strong="H3790"\w* the \w names|strong="H8036"\w* of the \w men|strong="H1400"\w* that \add were\add* the \w chief|strong="H7217"\w* of them.

And \w thus|strong="H3660"\w* they \w returned|strong="H8421"\w* us \w answer|strong="H6600"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0560"\w*, \w We|strong="H0586"\w* \w are|strong="H1994"\w* the \w servants|strong="H5649"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0772"\w*, and \w build|strong="H1124"\w* the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* that \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w builded|strong="H1124"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* \w many|strong="H7690"\w* \w years|strong="H8140"\w* \w ago|strong="H6928"\w*, which a \w great|strong="H7229"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w* \w builded|strong="H1124"\w* and set \w up|strong="H3635"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3861"\w* \w after|strong="H4481"\w* that our \w fathers|strong="H0002"\w* had \w provoked|strong="H7265"\w* the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w* unto \w wrath|strong="H7265"\w*, he \w gave|strong="H3052"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* of \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, the \w Chaldean|strong="H3679"\w*, who \w destroyed|strong="H5642"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H1541"\w* the \w people|strong="H5972"\w* \w away|strong="H1541"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1297"\w* in the \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w* \add the same\add* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* to \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.

And the \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* \w also|strong="H0638"\w* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* \w gold|strong="H1722"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, which \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* \w took|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* that \add was\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* them into the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w those|strong="H1994"\w* did \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w take|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, and they were \w delivered|strong="H3052"\w* unto \add one\add*, whose \w name|strong="H8036"\w* \add was\add* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, whom he had \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w governor|strong="H6347"\w*;\f + \fr 5.14 \ft governor: or, deputy\f*

And \w said|strong="H0560"\w* unto him, \w Take|strong="H5376"\w* \w these|strong="H0412"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w*, \w go|strong="H0236"\w*, \w carry|strong="H5182"\w* \w them|strong="H1994"\w* into the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* that \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, and let the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* be \w builded|strong="H1124"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* his \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w came|strong="H0858"\w* the \w same|strong="H1791"\w* \w Sheshbazzar|strong="H8340"\w*, \add and\add* \w laid|strong="H3052"\w* the \w foundation|strong="H0787"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*: and \w since|strong="H4481"\w* that \w time|strong="H0116"\w* even \w until|strong="H5705"\w* \w now|strong="H3705"\w* hath it been in \w building|strong="H1124"\w*, and \add yet\add* it is \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w finished|strong="H8000"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* therefore, \w if|strong="H2006"\w* \add it seem\add* \w good|strong="H2869"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, let there be \w search|strong="H1240"\w* made in the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w treasure|strong="H1596"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, which \add is\add* \w there|strong="H8536"\w* at \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, \w whether|strong="H2006"\w* it \w be|strong="H0383"\w* \add so\add*, that a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* was \w made|strong="H7761"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* to \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, and let the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w send|strong="H7972"\w* his \w pleasure|strong="H7470"\w* to us \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* this \w matter|strong="H1836"\w*.
